hero.description: A modern Next.js v14 starter template featuring authentication, internationalization, theme switching, and shadcn/ui component libraries to kickstart your next web application.
hero.punchline: Fastest start to your new web-app

authentication.title: Authentication & Authorization
authentication.description: Secure your application with NextAuth.js. Support for Credentials and role-based access control.

internationalization.title: Internationalization
internationalization.description: Make your app global with next-intl. Support for multiple languages and locales out of the box.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Track user behavior and performance with Vercel Analytics. Real-time insights and reporting.

themes.title: Theme Switching
themes.description: Toggle between light and dark modes seamlessly. Supports system preferences and user choice

components.title: Component Library
components.description: Beautiful, accessible components from shadcn/ui. Customizable and ready to use.

free.title: Free
free.description: Open-source and free to use. Get started with your new project today.

Index.title: Home
Index.description: Discover the amazing features of our application.
Index.secret: Secret page for logged in users

Feedback.title: Send Feedback
Feedback.description: We value your input! Let us know what you think about our product.
Feedback.name: Name
Feedback.error: {error, select, CredentialsFeedback {Invalid name or email} other {Unknown error}}

Login.title: Login
Login.error: {error, select, CredentialsSignin {Invalid username or password} other {Unknown error}}
Login.description: Enter your email below to login to your account
Login.notAdmin: You need administrator privileges to access this page.

Management.title: User Management
Management.description: Manage your users and send invitations.

Modify.title: Are you sure?
Modify.description: This will update the user's status.

Invite.title: Invite User
Invite.description: Send an invitation email to add a new user to the system.

Modify.title: Delete invitation
Modify.description: This will permanently delete the invitation. This action cannot be undone.

Create.title: Create an Account
Create.marketing: I want to receive marketing emails with product updates and company announcements

Login.description: Enter your email below to login to your account

Introduction.title: Introduction
Introduction.content: Welcome to our Privacy Policy. Your privacy is critically important to us.

DataCollected.title: Data Collected
DataCollected.content: We collect information such as your name, email, and usage data.

PurposeOfCollection.title: Purpose of Collection
PurposeOfCollection.content: We use your data to provide and improve our services.

DataStorageDuration.title: How Long Is the Data Stored
DataStorageDuration.content: We store your data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.

ThirdCountries.title: Involvement Into Third Countries
ThirdCountries.content: Your data might be processed in countries outside of your own.

YourRights.title: Your Rights
YourRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, and delete your data, among other rights.

Cookies.title: Cookies
Cookies.content: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze site traffic.

Conclusion.title: Conclusion
Conclusion.content: Thank you for reading our Privacy Policy. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.

Introduction.title: Introduction
Introduction.content: Welcome to our website! By accessing or using our services, you agree to comply with these Terms of Use. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

UseOfServices.title: Use of the Services
UseOfServices.content: You are permitted to use our services for lawful purposes only. Any unauthorized or harmful use is strictly prohibited.

UserObligations.title: User Obligations
UserObligations.content: You agree to provide accurate information when using our services and refrain from engaging in any activities that could harm the platform or other users.

IntellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
IntellectualProperty.content: All content, trademarks, and materials provided on this site are owned by us or our licensors. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without permission.

LimitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
LimitationOfLiability.content: We are not responsible for any damages arising from your use of our services. Use the platform at your own risk.

Termination.title: Termination of Use
Termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access if you violate these terms.

GoverningLaw.title: Governing Law
GoverningLaw.content: These terms are governed by the laws of [Insert Jurisdiction].

ChangesToTerms.title: Changes to Terms
ChangesToTerms.content: We may update these Terms of Use from time to time. Please review them regularly.

Conclusion.title: Conclusion
Conclusion.content: For any questions about these terms, feel free to contact us at [Insert Contact Information].
